name: places/ChIJa4jiirJZwokRp4juQH7vb8w
formattedAddress: 150 E 32nd St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 150 E 32nd St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
I was very anxious going in for my first MRI. The technicians and doctors were all extremely attentive, caring, and patient. (I also loved that the team was all women).

I needed some time to breathe and calm myself down after they inserted the IV and injected glucagon. They gave me all the time I needed and didn’t feel rushed at all. They also gave me ice packs when the injections gave me hot flashes.

I got to keep my sweater and shoes on since I was cold. They also gave me blankets, adjusted my pillows, played music (I recommend Mazzy Star), and talked to me through the scan to make sure I was doing okay. Despite being a nervous wreck, this was a very positive experience and I’m so grateful.

originalText.text: I had an issue with my ultrasound and I'm giving 5 stars because I am impressed with how both the tech and the leadership ultimately handled it. Being willing to accept feedback is the hallmark of a stellar practice. Thank you Adam and thank you to the tech, Natalya Markel.

originalText.text: Positive experience. Male tech was very nice and professional. All staff seemed professional and efficient. I was seen earlier than my appointment time.

text.text: Positive experience. Male tech was very nice and professional. All staff seemed professional and efficient. I was seen earlier than my appointment time.

originalText.text: Easy appointments,nice staff, professional doctor. The entrance is from 31st Street because there are constructions in 32nd street blocking their main entrance. This was August 14th 2023

originalText.text: Great and quick service. Actually I made a mistake and went to Tish location, so Tish’s receptionist called here to confirm if I can be accepted even after my time, so the radiology confirmed me to come in anyway. So I went for my ultrasound test. No waiting time at all. The lady technician was very professional as well friendly doing the test. Great experience.
